question_text:
Question 60 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Aptitude
Statements : Either P marries Q or X marries Y. Among the given option below, the logical negation of 
the above statements is,  
 
 
 
 
 
[2 Marks]
(A) Neither P marries Q nor X marries Y. 
(B) P does not marry Q and X marries Y

GATE 2021 
 [Forenoon Session]
Instrumentation Engineering
PAGE
53

(C) P marries Q and X marries Y. 
(D) X does not marries Y and P marries Q.
explanation_text:
Sol. 
As we are directed to do logical negation, of given statement, situation of “either or” will becomes 
“Neither nor”
as :  
P
Q
=
 
X
Y
=
Negation : 
P
Q
≠
 
X
Y
≠
Hence, the correct option is (A).
